scripts.qa-suite:static: npm run qa-suite:static:typecheck && npm run qa-suite:static:lint && npm run qa-suite:static:dependencies && npm run qa-suite:static:dead-exports && npm run qa-suite:static:duplication
scripts.qa-suite:static:typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix backend && npm run typecheck --prefix mobile && npm run typecheck --prefix shared
scripts.qa-suite:static:lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix mobile && npm run lint --prefix shared
scripts.qa-suite:static:dead-exports: ts-prune -p backend/tsconfig.json && ts-prune -p mobile/tsconfig.json && ts-prune -p shared/tsconfig.json
scripts.contracts:check: npm run build --prefix shared && node tooling/contract-check.js
scripts.analyze:deps: dependency-cruiser backend/src shared mobile/src --config tooling/dependency-rules.json --output-type dot | dot -T png > docs/evidence/import-graph.png && dependency-cruiser backend/src shared mobile/src --config tooling/dependency-rules.json --output-type metrics
scripts.validate:deps: dependency-cruiser backend/src shared mobile/src --config tooling/dependency-rules.json --output-type html > docs/evidence/dependency-cruiser-report.html && dependency-cruiser backend/src shared mobile/src --config tooling/dependency-rules.json --validate
